content:
All,

Below, are the list of tracker items up for 2 of 2 block votes during the OO call on Thursday March 1 at 1pm EASTERN. Please review the dispositions at your earliest convenience. This block contains a lot content regarding Workflow pattern alignment and so review the spreadsheets attached to the trackers for the summaries of detailed proposed resolutions.

If you do not agree with the proposed resolution for an item, please let me know via email. Since we are fast approaching the deadline for the next Ballot. Pulled item will likely be deferred to the next cycle in a subsequent vote.

We will continue to triage trackers on our OO on FHIR 11AM PACIFIC time call next week.

Block Vote B

Tracker Items
Comment Submitters
Casey McGruder
Cooper Thompson
David Hay
Eric Haas
Francois Macary
Lloyd McKenzie
Riki Merrick
Line Items
GF#11217 Thoughts+on+combining+SupplyRequest%2C+DeviceUseRequest+and+VisionPrescription+-+2016-09+core+%23371 (Riki Merrick) Considered for Future Use
GF#14038 how+to+represent+add-ons (Eric Haas) Considered for Future Use
GF#14142 Harmonize+DeviceUseStatement+with+MedicationStatement (Francois Macary) Considered for Future Use
GF#15089 Consider+whether+ServiceRequest.performer+should+be+0..%2A (Cooper Thompson)
GF#15515 %22Specimen+collection+method%22+value+set+needs+cleanup (Francois Macary) Not Persuasive
GF#13521 Add+%27declined%27+to+the+valueset+http%3A%2F%2Fhl7.org%2Ffhir%2Fdata-absent-reason (David Hay) Persuasive
GF#15088 Add+supporting+use+cases%2Fexamples+to+support+boundaries+with+ImagingStudy (Eric Haas) Persuasive
GF#15526 Add+LOINC+guidance+for+pattern+3 (Eric Haas) Persuasive
GF#15566 Nonfunctional+hyperlink+-+Device+Resource (Casey McGruder) Persuasive
GF#15597 Observation+Workpattern+alignment+part+of+larger+tracker+GF%2314450+%22OO+resources+do+not+have+a+clean+Workflow+report%22 (Eric Haas) Persuasive
GF#15598 DIAGNOSTICREPORT+WF+pattern+alignment+part+of+larger+tracker+GF%2314450+%22OO+resources+do+not+have+a+clean+Workflow+report%22 (Eric Haas) Persuasive
GF#15599 ServiceRequest+WF+pattern+alignment+part+of+larger+tracker+GF%2314450+%22OO+resources+do+not+have+a+clean+Workflow+report%22 (Eric Haas) Persuasive
GF#15600 Media+WF+pattern+alignment+part+of+larger+tracker+GF%2314450+%22OO+resources+do+not+have+a+clean+Workflow+report%22 (Eric Haas) Persuasive
GF#15601 NutritionOrder+WF+pattern+alignment+part+of+larger+tracker+GF%2314450+%22OO+resources+do+not+have+a+clean+Workflow+report%22 (Eric Haas) Persuasive
GF#14450 OO+resources+do+not+have+a+clean+Workflow+report (Lloyd McKenzie) Persuasive with Mod
GF#15516 Remove+guidance+suggesting+codes+can+be+sent+in+Device.identifier (Lloyd McKenzie) Persuasive with Mod

for your convienence I have added Block Vote A sent previously below which will also be voted on next week. I have removed the existing pulls:

Block Vote A:

Comment Submitters

Ardon Toonstra

Harri Honko

Joel Schneider

Lloyd McKenzie

Michelle Miller

William Johnson

Xin Liu

Line Items

GF#12913 Create+a+profile+for+%22Patient+characteristics%22 (Lloyd McKenzie) Considered for Future Use
GF#13938 Add+phsyical+activity+profiles+like+vitals (Harri Honko) Considered for Future Use
GF#14675 Reference%28ObservationDefinition%29+missing+from+Observation.basedOn (Joel Schneider) Considered for Future Use
GF#13801 Vital+signs+profiles+-+Body+Height (Ardon Toonstra) Not Persuasive
GF#14383 Add+new+code+%22genetic%22+into+coding+Observation.category+code+system+list (Xin Liu) Not Persuasive
GF#14466 Clarify+Observation+boundaries+%28with+OccupationalData%29+around+Social+History (Michelle Miller) Not Persuasive
GF#15090 Resources+should+not+use+the+identifier+field+as+the+unique+id (William Johnson) Persuasive
GF#15097 Update+cardinality+of+identifier+elements (William Johnson) Persuasive

It may be premature to defer content to R5 if it's dealing with non-normative. FMG hasn't set policy on what sorts of changes will be allowed after the ballot opens. It's almost certain that non-substantive changes will be permitted and it's possible that some types of non-substantive changes will be permitted as well. (Changes to candidate normative resources need to be much more strictly controlled.)

My preference would be to pull the "Considered for Future Use" ones until after FMG has defined the policy.
14142 - pull this. No reason to not define a smaller value set that points to v2 codes that are actually valid for the concept. Even example value sets should be limited to appropriate content - they don't have to be complete.
